### Idiom: 谨言慎行
### Meaning: 说话小心，行动谨慎。语本《礼记·缁衣》：“故言必虑其所终，而行必稽其所敝，则民谨於言而慎於行。”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 有线新闻的专业形象是由新闻部所有同事艰苦经营而来，能够保持下去，全赖大家在新闻专业上的坚持。希望大家明白新闻部是一个整体，无个人、无组别之分，大家的一言一行代表著‘有线新闻’，希望大家协力维系，谨言慎行。新闻厂是一个新闻部的核心，别具象征意义，大家应该好好发挥它的功能，将最快、最新、最专业的新闻报道带给观众，而不应该视它为一个嬉笑玩乐的舞台。
target: The professional image of the radio news is a result of the hard work of all the news department staff, and it depends on the steadfast determination of all members of the news department to maintain the professional image of the radio news. I hope everyone understands that the news department is a whole, no individuals or sections, everyone's words and actions represent the "radio news", and I want everyone to be diligent and tactful. The news shop is a central part of the news department, which is symbolic, and everyone should play its function well, bringing the latest, the most professional news to the audience, and not to see it as a place for jokes.

target: #Breakdown Stargazer, #Stargazer Chie# @Breakdown Stargazer Chie is so cute and cool skills, she can survive in dangerous situations, her skills can hide, can re-act after defeating enemies, her personality is brave, loud, wild, but very sensitive, I love her!

### Idiom: 运筹帷幄
### Meaning: 谓在后方决定作战策略。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 萧赫麟（1968年7月1日—），原名萧炳贤中华民国无党籍政治人物。萧赫麟还有个别名“齐原”他在演艺圈当过制作人、办活动，也曾在商界当过运筹帷幄的咨商顾问，工作经历丰富，尽管是政治素人，但他长年为弱势奔走，博得“陈情达人”称号，也因为长期协助弱势解决问题，才发现基层民众的困境，而台湾政治依然陷入两大党的污泥恶斗心机算计，台湾民众何时出头天？记者蓝振睿/综合报导。生于南投县，曾为新政世纪党、国会政党联盟、民主进步党党员，并曾被无党联盟、健保免费连线、人民最大党等政党提名，参与过第十届台北市议员选举、第八届立法委员选举、第二届新北市议员选举、第十三届台北市议员选举、第十届立法委员补选，惟目前未有当选之纪录。
target: Xiao Helin (July 1, 1968 -), formerly known as Xiao Bingxian, is a politician without party membership in the Republic of China. Xiao Helin is also known as "Qi Yuan". He has worked as a producer and event organizer in the entertainment industry, and has also worked as a strategizing consultant in the business world. He has rich work experience. Although he is a political amateur, he has been working for the disadvantaged for many years. He won the title of "Chen Qing Master" because he has been helping the disadvantaged to solve problems for a long time, and he discovered the plight of the grassroots people. However, Taiwan's politics is still mired in the vicious intrigues of the two major parties. When will the Taiwanese people make a difference? Reporter Lan Zhenrui/Comprehensive Report. Born in Nantou County, he was a member of the New Deal Century Party, the Congress Party Alliance, and the Democratic Progressive Party. He was nominated by the Non-Party Alliance, the National Health Insurance Free Connection, the People's Largest Party and other political parties. He participated in the 10th Taipei City Council election and the 19th Taipei City Councilor Election. The 8th Legislative Council Election, the 2nd New Taipei City Councilor Election, the 13th Taipei City Councilor Election, and the 10th Legislative Councilor By-election, but there is currently no record of being elected.

### Idiom: 江山易改，本性难移
### Meaning: 人的本性的改变，比江山的变迁还要难。形容人的本性难以改变。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 常言道“江山易改，本性难移”。
target: It is said that "the landscape can be changed, but the character is difficult to change".

context:
### Idiom: 质而不野
### Meaning: 质朴素、单纯。野粗俗。质朴而不粗俗。同质而不俚”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 其演奏指法规正，出音刚柔相济，清静圆润，继承了其师质而不野、文而不史的浙派传统风格，从事古琴艺术研究多年，多次应邀参加国外演出。
target: He plays with definite hand, a tight, clean sound, has inherited his teacher's style of "質而不野,文而不史", has been involved in ancient Chinese gong music for many years, has been called to perform in foreign countries several times.

### Idiom: 宗庙社稷
### Meaning: 宗庙祭祀祖先的场所；社稷古代帝王诸侯所祭的土神和谷神。代表封建统治者掌握的最高权力。也借指国家。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 霍光认为群臣要向东宫上奏政事，太后也要省察政事，应该了解经术，便请示上官太后让夏侯胜给其讲授《尚书》。夏侯胜升任长信少府，赐爵关内侯，又因参与废立皇帝，安定宗庙社稷有功，增封食邑千户。汉宣帝刚刚即位，想要颂扬先帝的功业，下诏给丞相、御史大夫说：“朕以微眇之身，承蒙先祖遗德，继承圣业，奉祀宗庙，日夜思虑。
target: Huo Guang believed that the ministers had to report political affairs to the East Palace, and the Queen Mother also wanted to examine the political affairs, so she should know the classics, so he asked the Shangguan Queen Mother to let Xiahou Sheng teach him the Book of Documents. Xia Housheng was promoted to the post of Changxin Shaofu, and was given the title of Marquis of Guannei. He also participated in the deposed emperor, stabilized the ancestral temple and the country, and was granted the title of a thousand households in the city. Emperor Xuan of the Han Dynasty had just ascended the throne and wanted to praise the late emperor's achievements. He issued an edict to the prime minister and the imperial censor, saying: "With my humble body, I have inherited the virtues of my ancestors, inherited the holy industry, worshiped in the ancestral temple, and thought about it day and night.

### Idiom: 黑漆一团
### Meaning: ①指墨团。②形容非弛暗，没有一点光明。或对人对事一无所知。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 因为你内心污染得厉害，自己的光明被遮盖住了，佛光想灌都灌不进来。你们打起坐来，不管开眼也好，闭眼也好，黑漆一团，一团乌烟瘴气，这就证明地狱在你面前。等你定慧到了，只要一定，自身光明随时都可以跟佛的光明相接！
target: Because you are deeply contaminated, your light is blocked, and the Buddha light cannot enter. You sit down, whether your eyes are open or closed, it is black and black, and the smoke and evil aura are dense. This means that hell is in front of you. As soon as you reach enlightenment, you can connect with the Buddha’s light at any time.

### Meaning: 来势急遽而猛烈的风雨。

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 那个人们印象中柔美的女子，唱一首首甜美的歌，听歌的人，却像是被一场骤风暴雨吹打过脸庞。
target: The beautiful woman in people's minds sang sweet songs, but those who listened to the songs felt as if a sudden storm had hit their faces.

### Idiom: 金人缄口
### Meaning: 金人铜制的人。缄口封嘴，指缄默不言。铜人闭口不讲话。形容言词谨慎。亦作金人三缄”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 金人缄口，为古慎言……口缄则气坚固，亦养生之要也。
target: Jin people keep their mouth shut, which is an ancient rule of caution... Keeping their mouth shut makes the Qi strong, and it is also the key to maintaining health.

context:
### Idiom: 进退有常
### Meaning: 常规律。前进和后退都有规律。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 日复一日、月复一月、年复一年，人们大都习惯了不经意地过日子，但每个节气时不时在提醒嘱咐的，却是升降出入、进退有常的经意生活。
target: Day after day, month after month, year after year, people have become accustomed to living a life of the unconscious, but the changes of the seasons are constantly reminding us that there are conscious and regular rhythms in life.

context:
### Idiom: 无往不胜
### Meaning: 无论到哪儿没有不胜利的。

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: weibo
source: 成长路上，不是鲜花满地，一路坦途。而是荆棘遍布，要用最柔软处去踩，流血结痂，然后无往不胜。
target: On the path of growth, it's not filled with flowers and smooth roads. Instead, it's full of thorns. You have to step on them with your most vulnerable parts, bleed and form scabs, and then become invincible.

### Idiom: 群雄逐鹿
### Meaning: 群雄旧指许多有军事势力的人。逐鹿比喻争夺帝王之位。形容各派势力争夺最高统治地位。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

source: 惠达卫浴在上交所鸣锣上市。因此，中国卫浴行业龙头老大的位置，自然引起群雄逐鹿，不少企业纷纷上市，以期打破这一局面。背景。
target: Huida Sanitary Ware was listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange. Therefore, the leading position in the Chinese sanitary ware industry naturally attracted many competitors. Many companies went public in an attempt to break this situation. Background.

source: 与樊樊山、朱祖谋、况周颐称清季“四大词宗”。俞樾评文卓的词：“豪宕之中兼以细腻，合大江东去、晓风残月为一手”。又精于音律。
target: He was regarded together with Feng Fengshan, Zhu Zuzun, Qin Zhouyi as the "four great song poets of the Qing Dynasty". Yushan praised Meng's poem: "He combined the grandeur and refinement, and achieved the great river flowing eastward, and the sunset and the moonlight into one hand." He was also good at music.

### Idiom: 鲜蹦活跳
### Meaning: 指鱼、禽等乱蹦乱跳而有生气。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 孩子们比父母更容易忍受艰难困苦，他们大部分时间都鲜蹦活跳，尽管样儿可怜--两眼深陷，肚子瘪瘪的。
target: Children are easier to endure difficulties than their parents, they are always healthy, although they look pitiful - their eyes are squinting, their stomach is swollen.

source: 目睹儿子面露愧色，母亲接着说，“你们要牢记父亲生前的教诲，恪守‘清慎勤’的为官之道，永葆清风峻节，尤其不能滋长一丝一毫的贪欲！”
target: Seeing her son's shameful expression, the mother continued, "You must remember your father's teachings during his lifetime, adhere to the principle of 'being prudent and diligent' in your official duties, always maintain integrity and high moral standards, and especially you must not cultivate even the slightest bit of greed!"

context:
### Idiom: 桀敖不驯
### Meaning: 凶悍倔强，傲慢不顺从。同桀骜不逊”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: cc-news
source: 2011年11月，在沙特等海湾阿拉伯国家施压下，萨利赫被迫辞职，其副总统哈迪则在2012年的总统大选中胜出，领导新一届也门政府。然已被挑起的骚乱无法平息，在胡塞武装、南方运动分头起事下，也门政府军分身乏术，无法恢复秩序，尽管出身南也门的哈迪多少能够管束南方运动，北部的胡塞却始终桀敖不驯。时至2014年，胡塞武装已占领也门北部大片土地，包括首都萨那，哈迪被迫同意与胡塞共组‘联合政府’，但双方在总理与石油部长人选上缺乏共识，最终联合政府宣告流产，也门内战乃于2015年正式白热化，胡塞武装遂在萨那建立新政府，哈迪则与支持者撤退到亚丁，其个人随后又流亡至沙特。
target: In November 2011, under pressure from Saudi Arabia and other Gulf Arab states, Saleh was forced to resign, with his vice president Hadi emerging victorious in the 2012 presidential election to lead the new Yemeni government. However, the unrest that had been ignited could not be quelled, and with the Houthis and the Southern Movement staging separate uprisings, the Yemeni government forces were stretched thin and unable to restore order, despite the fact that Hadi, who hailed from southern Yemen, could to some extent rein in the Southern Movement. By 2014, the Houthis had occupied large swaths of northern Yemen, including the capital Sana'a, forcing Hadi to agree to form a 'national unity government' with the Houthis, but the two sides lacked consensus on the selection of the prime minister and oil minister, and the unity government eventually collapsed, leading to the formal escalation of the Yemeni civil war in 2015, with the Houthis establishing a new government in Sana'a, while Hadi and his supporters retreated to Aden, and he later fled to Saudi Arabia.

context:
### Idiom: 随波逐尘
### Meaning: 犹言随波逐流。比喻没有坚定的立场，缺乏判断是非的能力，只能随着别人走。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 常因奇装异服饱受诟病。穿个衣服都要考虑别人的感受，只会人云亦云，随波逐尘，泯然众人。穿衣审美哪有标准，得体就行。
target: Their clothes are often criticized. They have to consider other people's feelings when they wear clothes. They will only be like the crowd, follow the trend, and be swept away by the crowd. There is no standard for aesthetics in clothing, and it is appropriate.

context:
### Idiom: 艰深晦涩
### Meaning: 艰深文辞深奥难懂；晦涩意义隐晦，不顺口。形容笔调深僻、寓意难以理解的文章。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 所谓禁欲主义不过是要求人们无条件地忍受专制压迫的枷锁罢了。霍尔巴赫指出:“使人成为善良的，是有理性的教育、高尚的习惯、贤明的体系，公正的法律和赏罚得当；而不是种种艰深晦涩的思辨。
target: So-called asceticism is nothing but the demand that people unconditionally endure the shackles of despotism. Holbach pointed out: "To make people good, rational education, noble habits, wise systems, fair laws and appropriate rewards and punishments are needed, rather than various obscure speculations."

### Meaning: 谓在后方决定作战策略。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 看似人畜无害，破绽多，但却是一顶一的武学高手，拥有100%空手接 白刃的强大技能。朝中重臣，生性狡诈阴险，老奸巨猾，心狠手辣，做事滴水不漏，在朝中运筹帷幄，是皇帝之下的二号人物，深得皇帝的宠信。明面上萧慕苓是治国有方的忠臣，但背地里勾结外敌，为了自己的利益通奸卖国。
target: It seems harmless and full of loopholes, but it is a strong master of martial arts. It has 100% skill to fight with a bare sword. The senior minister of the court, the nature is cunning and cunning, old and shrewd, cruel and ruthless, and everything is meticulous. He is the second person in the court, and is deeply trusted by the emperor. On the surface, Xiao Mumu is a loyal minister who is good at governing the country. However, he colluded with the enemy behind the scenes, and sold the country for his own interests.

context:
### Idiom: 大喜过望
### Meaning: 谓结果比原来希望的更好，因而感到特别高兴。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 听候大王发落。秦王政大喜过望，穿上君臣朝会时的礼服，安排朝会大典迎见荆轲。于是出现荆轲刺秦王的事件，蒙嘉后事不详。
target: Waiting for the outcome of the Duke of Qin. The Qin King was overjoyed, and he put on the ceremonial dress for a meeting between the king and his subordinates. He arranged the grand ceremony to welcome Qu Yuan. There was an event in which Qu Yuan stabbed the Qin King. The fate of Mongezhao is unknown.

context:
### Idiom: 走头无路
### Meaning: 绝路。比喻陷入绝境，没有出路。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 总是嘀咕走头无路的人是白痴，不会坐车吗？。
target: Those who always grumble that they have no way out are fools, don't they know how to ride a car?

context:
### Idiom: 无以复加
### Meaning: 不能再增加。谓已至极限。语本《左传·文公十七年》：“敝邑有亡，无以加焉。”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 林美美还硬着头皮不承认，结果又吃了两个大嘴巴子，人都快打傻了，老爸拿出来了那个海报，上边赫然是她的照片，不得不说，她的心酸到了无以复加的程度，自己还不是想给家里减少负担，只不过采用了这种不恰当的方式，当然如果这是发生在大城市，那种人与人之间特别冷漠的环境，也就没有什么大不了的事情，毕竟这个时代，还有几个女孩子的心灵是干净的，可家里的这些父老乡亲不同，他们一辈子也没有出过什么远门，对于外面的世界都充满了惊奇和畏惧，所以她的行为，就被扣上了不可饶恕的罪名，这让林美美十分揪心，她一时间百口莫辩，感觉自己都要被扔鸡蛋了，突然之间发现她的老爸似乎也沧桑了不少，原来不知不觉间，自己背弃的不仅仅是良心，还有家里人的殷切期待，唉，可事已至此，有什么办法呢。
target: Lin Meimei stubbornly refused to admit her mistake, and as a result, she was slapped twice. She was almost knocked senseless. Her father pulled out a poster, on which was her picture. She couldn't help but feel overwhelmingly heartbroken. She only wanted to lessen the burden on her family, but she had chosen an inappropriate method. Of course, if this had happened in a big city, in an environment where people are particularly indifferent to each other, it wouldn't have been a big deal. After all, in this era, how many girls' hearts are still pure? But the elders in her hometown were different. They had never traveled far in their lives and were full of awe and fear of the outside world. Therefore, her actions were labeled as unforgivable. This made Lin Meimei very distressed. She was at a loss for words, feeling as if she was about to be pelted with eggs. Suddenly, she realized that her father seemed to have aged a lot. Unconsciously, what she had abandoned was not only her conscience, but also the earnest expectations of her family. Alas, but what can she do now that things have come to this point?

context:
### Idiom: 缩衣节食
### Meaning: 省吃省穿。泛指生活节俭。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 这些年来，大抵是随着全民生活水平的逐步提高，越来越多的年轻一族热爱奢侈品，并且对于其购买的力度也在不断的上涨，经常是缩衣节食来满足自己的需求，但奢侈品的价格往往非常的昂贵，一旦出现在不喜欢或者闲置的时候，就十分的浪费。
target: In recent years, usually as the overall living standards have continued to rise, a growing number of young people have become obsessed with luxury, and they are willing to sacrifice their clothing to satisfy their needs, but luxury is often very expensive, and if not used or kept, is a waste of money.

context:
### Idiom: 游目骋怀
### Meaning: 游目远眺；骋怀放开胸怀，往远处想。纵目四望，开阔心胸。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 舟凡五艘，中有滊动机名约见取丸，先一小时启航。团员争先登舟者凡二十七人，是日，天气晴朗，薰风习习，仰观宇宙之大，俯瞰沧溟之远，游目骋怀，逸兴遄飞，致足乐也。岂意乐未极而悲生，景未观而祸起，忽而黑云四赽，而天地晦冥；风雨骤至，而浊浪排空。
target: There are five boats in the boat, and one of them has the name of meeting and taking pills, and they will set sail one hour first. Twenty-seven of the group members were the first to board the boat. It was a sunny day and the wind was blowing. It was a great pleasure to look up at the vastness of the universe and the vast distances. Unexpectedly, sorrow arises before the joy is over, misfortune arises before the scenery is seen, black clouds suddenly appear, and the sky and earth are dim; wind and rain suddenly come, and the turbid waves clear up.

context:
### Idiom: 走头无路
### Meaning: 绝路。比喻陷入绝境，没有出路。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 天主/基督/佛/道……教的，可不可以算or学塔罗？客户走头无路了，说是算塔罗试试看，但他信奉**，不知道能算吗？还有之前也有学员有疑惑，某教派是否可以学塔罗？统一回复一下，塔罗没有“神”没有“信仰”没有“规矩”，塔罗只是一副纸牌而已。
target: Whether it's Catholic/Christian/Buddhist/Taoist... religion, can it be counted or learned as tarot? The customer is at a loss and says to try to calculate with tarot, but he believes in **, not knowing if he can calculate. There were also some doubts among previous students about whether a certain religious denomination can learn tarot. Please reply in unison that tarot has no "God", no "faith", no "rules", tarot is just a deck of cards.
